sentences.english: She can sing beautifully.

detailed_translations.english: to produce a musical sound with your voice

sentences.chinese: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.chinese: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.chinese: 要经常检查水质。

sentences.chinese: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.english: I’m usually out on Friday evenings.
sentences.chinese: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.chinese: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

sentences.english: We had just finished our evening meal when the doorbell rang.

trans: used when you did not hear what sb said and you want them to repeat it

sentences.chinese: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.chinese: 我们下周将开会讨论此事。

sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.chinese: 在十一月又一次。

sentences.chinese: 群众大会上午9点届时召开。

sentences.english: Radio Beijing radiobroadcasts news at 9 a.m. every day.
sentences.chinese: 北京广播电台每天上午九时广播新闻。

sentences.english: There’s a meeting on Thursday afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 星期四下午有个会议。

sentences.english: It was very hot in the afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午很热。

sentences.english: See you tomorrow afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 明天下午见。

sentences.english: Are you going into town this afternoon ?
sentences.chinese: 今天下午你进城去吗？

sentences.english: We met in the early afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午较早的时候我们见了面。

sentences.english: By late afternoon , Micky had changed his mind.
sentences.chinese: 到了傍晚，米基已改变了主意。

sentences.english: He was having his afternoon nap .
sentences.chinese: 他在睡午觉。

detailed_translations.english: the part of the day after the morning and before the evening

sentences.english: She lives in a small apartment.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一套小公寓里。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms on one floor of a large building, where someone lives

sentences.english: Aunt Mary
sentences.chinese: 玛丽姑妈

detailed_translations.english: the sister of your father or mother, or the wife of your father’s or mother’s brother

sentences.english: It’s my birthday on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 星期一是我的生日。

sentences.english: My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.english: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

detailed_translations.english: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born

sentences.english: I have two brothers, William and Mark.
sentences.chinese: 我有两个兄弟，威廉和马克。

sentences.english: My big brother (=  older brother  ) has always looked after me.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥一直照顾我。

sentences.english: my twin brother
sentences.chinese: 我的双胞胎兄弟

sentences.english: We must work together, brothers!
sentences.chinese: 我们必须携手工作，伙计们！

detailed_translations.english: a male who has the same parents as you

sentences.english: It’s Dad’s birthday and we’re going out for a meal to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今天是爸爸的生日，我们打算出去吃饭庆祝一下。

sentences.english: My folks are celebrating their 50th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我父母正在庆祝他们结婚50周年。

sentences.english: poems that celebrate the joys of love
sentences.chinese: 赞美爱之喜悦的诗歌

detailed_translations.english: to show that an event or occasion is important by doing something special or enjoyable

sentences.english: a chocolate bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.english: a box of chocolates
sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

detailed_translations.english: a sweet brown food that you can eat as a sweet or use in cooking to give foods such as cakes a special sweet taste

sentences.english: Come on, let’s dance.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，我们跳舞吧。

sentences.english: The words danced before her tired eyes.
sentences.chinese: 这些字在她疲乏的眼前晃动。

sentences.english: The waltz is an easy dance to learn.
sentences.chinese: 华尔兹这种舞很容易学。

detailed_translations.english: to move your body to the sound and rhythm of music
a special set of movements performed to a particular type of music

sentences.english: I’m afraid I wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我没有受到邀请。

sentences.english: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.chinese: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

sentences.english: She started work here last March.
sentences.chinese: 她去年3月开始在这儿工作。

detailed_translations.english: the third month of the year, between February and April

sentences.english: Graduation ceremonies are held in early May.
sentences.chinese: 毕业典礼在5月初举行。

detailed_translations.english: the fifth month of the year, between April and June

name: never
trans: 从未, 永不, 决不

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

sentences.english: And again in November.
sentences.chinese: 在十一月又一次。

sentences.english: Too much snow in November.
sentences.chinese: 太多的大雪在十一月。

detailed_translations.english: the 11th month of the year, between October and December

sentences.english: Most seasonal hiring is done in early October.
sentences.chinese: 多数季节性招聘是在10月初进行。

detailed_translations.english: the tenth month of the year, between September and November

sentences.english: She was presented with an award .
sentences.chinese: 她被授予一个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone, for example at a formal or official occasion

sentences.english: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.chinese: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.english: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.chinese: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.english: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

detailed_translations.english: the ninth month of the year, between August and October

sentences.english: She can sing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 她唱歌很好听。

sentences.english: Most children enjoy singing.
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都喜欢唱歌。

sentences.english: We had a great time singing some of the old songs .
sentences.chinese: 我们唱了一些老歌，非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to sing in tune (= sing the correct notes ) .
sentences.chinese: 我唱歌总是跑调。

sentences.english: She patiently sang the baby to sleep .
sentences.chinese: 她耐心地唱歌哄宝宝入睡。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a musical sound with your voice

sentences.english: Always lock your bicycle to something secure.
sentences.chinese: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.english: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.chinese: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.english: He hadn’t always been a butler.
sentences.chinese: 他并不是一直当管家。

sentences.english: I’ll always remember that day.
sentences.chinese: 我会永远记住那一天。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, at all times, or every time

sentences.english: You can paint, do repairs, and if you have already hired contractors in April or earlier, continue to work on your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你可以涂涂油漆，做点小修补，如果你已经在四月或更加之前就已经雇到承包商的话，按原计划进行没关系。

sentences.english: This past April while visiting my parents on the farm I’d grown up on, I wandered outside to drink in the feel of “home”, a comfort I really needed right then.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚过去的那个四月，我回到我在那长大的农场探望我的父母。 我在屋外漫步，沉浸在“家”的舒适感觉中——当时我真的很需要家的慰藉。

detailed_translations.english: the fourth month of the year, between March and May

sentences.english: He moved to another city last August.
sentences.chinese: 去年八月，他搬到另一座城市。

sentences.english: That night in August, waiting for the Rolling Stones to come on stage, we felt like rebels.
sentences.chinese: 在那个八月的夜晚，在等待滚石乐队登台演出时，我们有种造反的感觉。

sentences.english: They make a huge migration from the north to the south of the US, mostly starting in August and the other way around in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 大部分是从八月开始，它们开始进行巨大的迁徙，从美国的北部到南部，而到了春天又沿相反方向回来。

detailed_translations.english: the eighth month of the year, between July and September

sentences.english: I’ve just started reading a book by Graham Greene.
sentences.chinese: 我刚开始看格雷厄姆·格林写的一本书。

sentences.english: a cookery book
sentences.chinese: 烹饪书

sentences.english: Have you booked a holiday this year?
sentences.chinese: 你今年有没有预订去度假？

detailed_translations.english: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that you can read them
to make arrangements to stay in a place, eat in a restaurant, go to a theatre etc at a particular time in the future

sentences.english: Her grandmother lent her a camera for a school trip to Venice and Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used to take photographs or make films or television programmes

sentences.english: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.english: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.english: a piece of card
sentences.chinese: 一张卡片纸

sentences.english: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.chinese: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc

sentences.english: In the dark of December.
sentences.chinese: 在十二月的黑夜里。

sentences.english: Our summers are short and our winters long.In December, when it is darkest, we only have a few hours of very weak sunlight per day.
sentences.chinese: 我们的夏天很短但是冬天很长，在十二月，也就是最黑的时候，我们的一天中只有很短的时间可以看到微弱的阳光。

sentences.english: I send out Valentine’s cards with the girls’ photo, instead of trying to mail cards in December.
sentences.chinese: ——我寄出有女孩子照片的情人节贺卡，以代替试图在十二月寄出的贺卡。

detailed_translations.english: the 12th month of the year, between November and January

sentences.english: He joined the Army in February 1943.
sentences.chinese: 他1943年2月参军。

detailed_translations.english: the second month of the year, between January and March

sentences.english: I'm going out tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我今晚要出去玩。

detailed_translations.english: If you go out, you leave your home in order to do something enjoyable, for example to go to a party, a bar, or the movies

sentences.english: We always have snow in January.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里1月份总会下雪。

detailed_translations.english: the first month of the year, between December and February

sentences.english: But from February through July, Joy sat around with nothing to do.
sentences.chinese: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.english: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.chinese: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.english: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.chinese: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。

sentences.english: He spent two and a half weeks with us in June 1986.
sentences.chinese: 1986年6月，他和我们呆了两个半星期。

detailed_translations.english: the sixth month of the year, between May and July

sentences.english: We’re having a small party this evening to celebrate our wedding anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚有个小聚会，庆祝我们的结婚纪念日。

sentences.english: the party spirit
sentences.chinese: 参加社交聚会的乐趣

sentences.english: I have always voted for the Labour Party.
sentences.chinese: 我一直投工党的票。

detailed_translations.english: a social event when a lot of people meet together to enjoy themselves by eating, drinking, dancing etc

sentences.english: She was wearing the perfume that he’d bought her.
sentences.chinese: 她擦了他买给她的香水。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid with a strong pleasant smell that women put on their skin or clothing to make themselves smell nice
to put perfume on something

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.english: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

name: uncle
trans: 伯父, 姨丈, 叔父, 舅舅

sentences.english: Lily spent years caring for her sick uncle.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉照顾了她生病的叔叔好多年。

sentences.english: After his parents cashed in, he lived with his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 他在父母去世后，与叔叔在一起过。

sentences.english: When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.
sentences.chinese: 她的父母刚一去世，她的叔叔便把她送进了孤儿院。

detailed_translations.english: used by children, in front of a first name, to address or refer to a man who is a close friend of their parents

sentences.english: Women usually live longer than men.
sentences.chinese: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.english: Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.chinese: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.english: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations

sentences.english: Dark clouds floated across the moon.
sentences.chinese: 乌云飘过月亮。

sentences.english: A cloud of steam rose into the air.
sentences.chinese: 一团水蒸气升到空中。

sentences.english: Fears of renewed terrorist attacks cast a cloud over the event (= spoilt the happy situation ) .
sentences.chinese: 对恐怖分子再次发动袭击的担心给这次活动蒙上了一层阴影。

detailed_translations.english: a white or grey mass in the sky that forms from very small drops of water

name: cloudy
trans: 多云的,阴天的,愁容满面的

sentences.english: a cloudy night with some light rain
sentences.chinese: 伴有些许小雨的多云的夜晚

sentences.english: Tomorrow, it will be cloudy and cool.
sentences.chinese: 明天多云，天气凉爽。

detailed_translations.english: a cloudy sky, day etc is dark because there are a lot of clouds

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.english: a blast of cold air
sentences.chinese: 一股冷空气

sentences.english: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.english: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.chinese: 我冷得发抖。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

name: cool
trans: 清凉的, 凉爽的, 凉快的

sentences.english: She swam out into the cool water.
sentences.chinese: 她往外游向清凉的水里。

sentences.english: The evening air was cool.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚的空气很凉爽。

sentences.english: Relax in the sun with a cool drink.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下喝杯清凉饮料放松一下。

sentences.english: the cooler weather of September
sentences.chinese: 九月较凉爽的天气

detailed_translations.english: low in temperature, but not cold, often in a way that feels pleasant
to make something slightly colder, or to become slightly colder
a temperature that is pleasantly cold
used to tell someone to stop being angry, violent etc

sentences.english: Newspapers vary in the degree to which they emphasize propaganda rather than information.
sentences.chinese: 报纸重宣传轻资讯的程度各不相同。

detailed_translations.english: the level or amount of something

sentences.english: It will be a cold night, and there may be fog patches .
sentences.chinese: 今夜天气寒冷，部分地区可能有雾。

sentences.english: A blanket of fog covered the fields.
sentences.chinese: 大雾笼罩了田野。

sentences.english: The fog lifted (= disappeared ) in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午，雾散了。

detailed_translations.english: cloudy air near the ground which is difficult to see through

detailed_translations.chinese: 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩
detailed_translations.english: if something made of glass fogs or becomes fogged, it becomes covered in small drops of water that make it difficult to see through

sentences.english: a foggy day in November
sentences.chinese: 11月的一个雾天

sentences.english: driving in foggy conditions
sentences.chinese: 雾天驾驶

detailed_translations.english: if the weather is foggy, there is fog

sentences.english: a hot day in July
sentences.chinese: 7月炎热的一天

sentences.english: a hot curry
sentences.chinese: 一种辛辣的咖喱

detailed_translations.english: something that is hot has a high temperature - used about weather, places, food, drink, or objects

sentences.english: The payment will be refunded to you minus a small service charge.
sentences.chinese: 这笔款项扣除一小笔服务费后将退还给你。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that one number or quantity is being  subtract ed  from another
something that is a disadvantage because it makes a situation unpleasant
used to talk about a disadvantage of a thing or situation

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
sentences.chinese: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.english: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.chinese: 外面仍在下雨。

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

name: rainy
trans: 下雨的, 含雨的, 带雨的, 多雨的

sentences.english: a cold rainy day in October
sentences.chinese: 十月里一个寒冷的雨天

sentences.english: I hate rainy weather .
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌雨天。

sentences.english: the rainy season
sentences.chinese: 雨季

detailed_translations.english: a rainy period of time is one when it rains a lot

sentences.english: Snow was falling heavily as we entered the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们进村的时候雪下得正大。

sentences.english: I could see footprints in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我看到雪地里有脚印。

sentences.english: The town was buried under three feet of snow.
sentences.chinese: 小镇被三英尺厚的积雪覆盖着。

detailed_translations.english: soft white pieces of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather and cover the ground
if it snows, snow falls from the sky

sentences.english: the snowy fields
sentences.chinese: 被雪覆盖的田野

sentences.english: one snowy January day
sentences.chinese: 1月里大雪纷飞的一天

detailed_translations.chinese: 下雪的，多雪的；被雪覆盖的；洁白无瑕的
detailed_translations.english: with a lot of snow

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

detailed_translations.english: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves
to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining

name: sunny
trans: 阳光充足的, 睛朗的, 明媚的

sentences.english: a warm sunny day
sentences.chinese: 温暖晴朗的一天

sentences.english: a sunny morning
sentences.chinese: 艳阳高照的上午

sentences.english: a nice sunny room
sentences.chinese: 阳光充足的房间

sentences.english: I hope it’s sunny tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我希望明天天晴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of light from the sun

name: warm
trans: 暖和的, 温暖的, 暖的

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.english: I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water
sentences.chinese: 温水

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

name: weather
trans: 天气, 气候, 气象

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.

sentences.chinese: 塞德奎斯特说：“艾里和赛克宁一样，对那些常常在外面吃饭的人有用，因为他们对食物中的脂肪量没法控制。

sentences.chinese: 他昨天被警察审问了两次。

sentences.chinese: 护士给病人服阿司匹林。

sentences.chinese: 她让他服用非阿司匹林药片降温退烧。

sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.chinese: 安迪发烧了，今天不来上班。

sentences.chinese: 我们需要马上得到帮助！

sentences.chinese: 你也许可以从当地政府获得拨款。

sentences.chinese: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.chinese: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

sentences.chinese: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.chinese: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。

sentences.chinese: 我露营了一个星期，实在得洗个澡了。

sentences.chinese: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.chinese: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.chinese: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.chinese: 简随手关上身后的门。

sentences.chinese: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

sentences.chinese: 面积为9,000平方码的一片区域

sentences.chinese: 洗完澡后请把浴缸洗干净。
